mapper.select: select product_type_id as id, name as name from tbl_product_class where type=#{type}

select pro.prod_id as id, pro.product_name as productName, pro.product_intro as profile, pro.product_pic as imgId, pro.product_type as category, pro.providers_id as providersId, pi.provider_name as providersName from tbl_product pro left join tbl_product_class pc on pro.product_type=pc.product_type_id left join tbl_providers_info pi on pro.providers_id = pi.providers_id where pro.sts = 1 and pi.serviceType=1 and product_type = #{categoryId} order by pro.order_no LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select count(pro.prod_id) from tbl_product pro, tbl_product_class pc,tbl_providers_info pi where pro.sts = 1 and pi.serviceType=1 and pro.product_type=pc.product_type_id and pro.providers_id = pi.providers_id and product_type = #{categoryId}

select pro.prod_id as id, pro.product_name as productName, pro.product_intro as profile, pro.product_pic as imgId, pro.product_type as category, pro.providers_id as providersId, pi.provider_name as providersName from tbl_product pro left join tbl_product_class pc on pro.product_type=pc.product_type_id left join tbl_providers_info pi on pro.providers_id = pi.providers_id where pro.sts = 1 and pi.serviceType=1 and pc.type=#{type} order by pro.order_no LIMIT 0, 4
